stalker.models.mixins.ReferenceMixin¶

class stalker.models.mixins.ReferenceMixin(references=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Adds reference capabilities to the mixed in class.

References are stalker.models.entity.Entity instances or anything derived from it, which adds information to the attached objects. The aim of the References are generally to give more info to direct the evolution of the object.

Parameters:references (list of Entity objects.) – A list of Entity objects.
__init__(references=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Methods

__init__([references])
